definition: Petersburg (place name)/Saint Petersburg, Russia
that/those/(one) another
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
Saint Petersburg (city in Russia)

sentences.english: St. Petersburg had become Petrograd in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 聖彼得堡在1914年變成彼得格勒。

sentences.english: Energy security is the theme of this year's G-8 summit in St.
sentences.chinese: 能源安全是今年聖彼得堡八國峯會的主題。

sentences.english: Evgeni: When I came to St. Petersburg at 11, we got along immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我十一歲來到聖彼得堡時，我們立刻就相處的很好。

sentences.english: The task will not end in St Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 這項任務不會終結於聖彼得堡。

sentences.english: He returned to St. Petersburg in 1730.
We flew on to St. Petersburg, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我們飛往俄羅斯的聖彼得堡。

sentences.english: Among the properties to be completed next year are ones in Marrakech, Morocco, and St. Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 而且明年摩洛哥馬拉喀什和聖彼得堡的項目也將完成。

sentences.english: He was in Petersburg, and Bolkonsky was glad to hear it.
sentences.chinese: 他在彼得堡，這消息使博爾孔斯基很愉快。

sentences.english: The Admiralty was one of the first structures to be built in St Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 海軍部大樓是聖彼得堡一流建築之一。

sentences.english: It's bad enough that Vladimir Lenin's eponymous city is St.
sentences.chinese: 列寧以其名字命名的城市現在又恢復聖彼得堡的舊名。

sentences.english: This is the first truly marble palace in the environs of St. Petersburg.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一個位於聖彼得堡附近的真正大理石宅邸。

sentences.english: It was drizzling with gentle breeze in St. Petersburg in summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季的聖彼得堡，微風輕拂，細雨綿綿。

sentences.english: St. Petersburg was founded by Peter the Great in 1703.
sentences.chinese: 聖彼得堡是彼得大帝於1703年建成的。

sentences.english: St. Petersburg is actually a really hard place to put your finger on.
sentences.chinese: 聖彼得堡是一個讓人挑不出什麼毛病的地方。

sentences.english: All it comes down to is Gazprom's naked ambition.
sentences.chinese: 所有歸結到一點，就是聖彼得堡赤裸裸的野心。

sentences.english: This is one day exhibition which will be held at the Coliseum-Downtown St.
sentences.chinese: 這是一天展覽將於聖彼得堡市區體育館。
